snippet: The aircraft maker’s stock dropped sharply, dragging the Dow Jones industrial average lower.
abstract: Boeing's stock drops sharply on problems with its new 787 Dreamliner plane, dragging Dow Jones industrial average lower.
lead_paragraph: The aircraft maker’s stock dropped sharply, dragging the Dow Jones industrial average lower.

headline.main: Problems at Boeing Lead Dow Lower
headline.print_headline: Problems at Boeing Lead Dow Lower
